title: Learning Designer Competency Development Program Applying Design-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Current practitioners from diverse industries (education, corporations, startups, etc.) participate, focusing on strengthening practical competencies related to language learning content design

learning_goals: Learners can design real-world language learning scenarios and develop prototypes using design-based research methodologies.
Learners can systematically perform core stages of instructional design, including learner analysis, goal setting, and assessment tool development.
Learners can plan language learning content suitable for digital environments (online/mobile) and propose implementation methods.

resources: Digital Content Authoring Tools (e.g., Canva, Articulate)
Real-Time Collaboration Platforms (e.g., Miro, Google Workspace)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
